import React, { Component } from 'react' import './index.scss' class Sidebar extends Component { state={ openSidebar:'true' } toggleSidebar=(open)=>{ this.setState({open}) } render() { const {open}=this.state; console.log(open,"open") return (
this.toggleSidebar(!open)}>X
